sentence.Network_en: Don't assume your baby automatically needs feeding if she's fretful.
sentence.Network_cn: 不要想当然地认为你的宝宝一闹就是要吃奶。

sentence.Network_en: Strangely enough, you will automatically wake up after this length of time.
sentence.Network_cn: 奇怪的是，过了这样一段时间你就会自己醒来。

sentence.Network_en: Don't automatically accept the solicitor recommended by the broker.
sentence.Network_cn: 别想当然地就接受中间人推荐的诉状律师。

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...。例如，像“我死后要将我的骨灰撒遍月球”这样一种遗嘱的单纯表达（sheer expression），并不自动地（automatically）意味着该遗嘱须得到法律上的尊重。一项法律规范指定在什么条件下遗嘱具有法律效力。因而，规范在逻辑上先于.
automatically becomes head of the student activities committee ., 都会自然而然的成为学生会的头儿.

新概念英语单词大全_百度文库 ... audience n. 听众，观众，接见，拜见 automatically ad. 自然而然地 automation n. 自动化.

list.abs: ...ear）的选项，选你要用的手动（manual）或是自动（automatic）就行了。
(A-B)英语四级词汇表下载 ... auto n. (口语)汽车 automatic a. 自动的；机械的 automation n. 自动，自动化.

entry.def: An automatic machine or device is one which has controls that enable it to perform a task without needing to be constantly operated by a person. Automatic methods and processes involve the use of such machines.
An automatic is a gun that keeps firing shots until you stop pulling the trigger.

example.ex: He drew his automatic and began running in the direction of the sounds...
example.tran: 他拔出自动手枪，向声音传来的方向跑去。

example.ex: The gunmen opened fire with automatic weapons.
example.tran: 歹徒用自动武器开火了。

entry.tran: 自动挡汽车;自动变速汽车
entry.def: An automatic is a car in which the gears change automatically as the car's speed increases or decreases.
An automatic action is one that you do without thinking about it.

example.ex: All of the automatic body functions, even breathing, are affected.
example.tran: 身体所有的无意识功能，甚至呼吸，都受到影响。

entry.def: If something such as an action or a punishment is automatic, it happens without people needing to think about it because it is the result of a fixed rule or method.

example.ex: Those drivers should face an automatic charge of manslaughter...
example.tran: 那些司机必然会受到过失杀人的指控。

example.ex: Israel offers automatic citizenship to all Jews who want it.
example.tran: 以色列为所有希望获得公民身份的犹太人敞开大门。

means.word_mean: 2. in a mechanical manner; by a mechanism;

auth_sentence.content: This will automatically inject the person with the drug.
auth_sentence.res_content: This will automatically inject the person with the drug.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This will automatically inject the person with the drug.

auth_sentence.content: Not two actresses you automatically think of as interchangeable.
auth_sentence.res_content: Not two actresses you automatically think of as interchangeable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Not two actresses you automatically think of as interchangeable.

auth_sentence.content: They work automatically without you being aware of them.
auth_sentence.res_content: They work automatically without you being aware of them.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They work automatically without you being aware of them.

Sentence.sentence: What controls remain for the users will be audio-based, so, for example, you'll just have to say "a bit warmer", and the air conditioning will adjust automatically.

Burger King, the nation's second-largest fast food chain, for instance, will stop automatically including French fries and soda in its kids' meals starting this month, although they will still be available.
Under the settlement, when no rights holders come forward and register their interest in a work, commercial control automatically reverts to Google.

sentences.en: automatically transmitting data from one part of the system to another
sentences.cn: 自动把数据从系统的一部分传到另一部分

sentences.en: Some doors have locks which automatically lock the doors when we close them.
sentences.cn: 有些门上的锁在关门时会自动把门锁好。

sentences.en: Husbands and wives of British nationals do not automatically gain citizenship.
sentences.cn: 英国公民的配偶不能自动取得公民身分。

means.word_mean: 无意识地,不自觉地,机械地

sentences.en: Business success does not automatically lead to financial success.
Honours were automatically awarded to senior officials just because they were senior.
sentences.cn: 荣誉顺理成章地授予资深官员，就因为他们资格老。
